articles.title: My Campaign Isn't Running
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: Troubleshooting tips and strategies to get your campaigns live again.

troubleshooting_steps.details: It can take up to 12 hours for campaigns to start sending results. If longer than 12 hours, contact Vibe team support.
Check if ads have been flagged for inappropriate content. Look for email from Vibe team about creative compliance.
Narrow targeting can limit IP address availability. Look for delivery estimator warning on strategy page. Widen your targeting dimensions until the delivery estimator turns green.
Recommended to use Automatic Bidding. If using Manual Bidding, set max CPM to $18 or above to maximize campaign deliverability.

articles.final_recommendation: If none of these scenarios apply to you, please contact a Vibe team member for support via the chat box at the bottom left of your screen.

articles.title: I Can't Register with my Email Address
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: We can help you get your email address approved.

content.issue: Vibe only accepts business emails for platform signups and does not accept emails from common personal domains like @gmail, @yahoo, or @aol.
content.solution: If you only have a personal email address, Vibe can manually create an account for you. Send a quick message via the chatbot with your email address and receive a confirmation shortly.

articles.title: My Video Won't Upload
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: Troubleshooting guide for uploading videos to the Vibe platform
articles.important_note: Be careful, if your file is even 1 second too long, it will not upload.
articles.support_contact: Still having trouble? Contact a Vibe support team member through the chat box.

articles.title: Video Formatting
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: The days of million dollar mini movie ads are over. Both content and format are now so much simpler

audio_specifications.sound_effects: -10db to -20db with occasional spikes up to -8db

articles.additional_note: For optimal compatibility and acceptance by our premium publishers, any video uploaded with a resolution lower than 1080 pixels (HD quality) will need to be modified by the Vibe team.
articles.support_contact: Still having trouble? Contact support through the chat box.

articles.title: Improve Deliverability Range
articles.author: Vincent Paoli
articles.description: How to optimize campaign deliverability when the delivery gauge reads 'Average' and the campaign struggles to spend its entire budget.

troubleshooting_steps.details: Check how targeting impacts delivery. A campaign with just 1 or 2 age segments may have a very limited audience size.
Verify daily estimated reach. If not, try to add more channels.
If using automatic bidding, try manual mode. Try to increase your CPM by switching to the manual mode for a few hours.
Consider geo-targeting and delivery time slots. These can affect campaign delivery.

articles.final_recommendation: If you've checked all the above and delivery still doesn't improve, please contact your Account Manager to ask for assistance.

articles.title: I have a question and can't find the Vibe chatbot
articles.author: Nicolas Hemidy
articles.description: Troubleshooting guide for users who cannot locate the Vibe customer support chatbot
articles.issue: Ad blockers can interfere with Vibe's customer support chat feature.
solutions: Contact support via email at support@vibe.co
articles.key_point: If you are running Ad Blockers on your computer, they can sometimes interfere with Vibe's customer support chat feature.
